00192     /**

00210     private $_extRelPath         = '';

00213      * The properties of the TCA control section

00215     private $_ctrl               = array();

00227     /**
00228      * Class constructor
00229      * 
00230      * @param   string  The extension key
00231      * @param   string  The full table name
00232      * @return  NULL
00233      */
00234     private function __construct( $extKey, $tableName )
00235     {
00236         // Stores the extension key and full table (instance) name
00237         $this->_extKey                      = $extKey;
00238         $this->_instanceName                = $tableName;
00239         
00240         // Gets the extension paths (absolute and relative)
00241         $this->_extPath                     = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( $this->_extKey );
00242         $this->_extRelPath                  = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( $this->_extKey );
00243         
00244         // Sets the table title
00245         $this->_ctrl[ 'title' ]             = 'LLL:EXT:'
00246                                             . $this->_extKey
00247                                             . '/lang/'
00248                                             . $this->_instanceName
00249                                             . '.xml:'
00250                                             . $this->_instanceName;
00251         
00252         // By default, the field used as label is 'uid'
00253         $this->_ctrl[ 'label' ]             = 'uid';
00254         
00255         // Sets the icon file path (by default, in the extension's res/img directory)
00256         $this->_ctrl[ 'iconfile' ]          = $this->_extRelPath
00257                                             . 'res/img/'
00258                                             . $this->_instanceName
00259                                             . '.gif';
00260         
00261         // Sets the field used to store the creation date
00262         $this->_ctrl[ 'cdrate' ]            = 'crdate';
00263         
00264         // Sets the field used to store the modification date
00265         $this->_ctrl[ 'tstamp' ]            = 'tstamp';
00266         
00267         // Sets the field used to store the ID of the BE user who created the record
00268         $this->_ctrl[ 'cruser_id' ]         = 'cruser_id';
00269         
00270         // Special fields configuration array (for hidden, starttime, endtime and fe_group)
00271         $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ]     = array();
00272         
00273         // String to prepend when a record is copied
00274         $this->_ctrl[ 'prependAtCopy' ]     = ' (copy %s)';
00275         
00276         // Use --div-- markers to create tabs in the TCE forms
00277         $this->_ctrl[ 'dividers2tabs' ]     = true;
00278         
00279         // By default, records are sorted by 'uid'
00280         $this->setDefaultSortBy( 'uid' );
00281     }

00283     /**
00284      * Gets a property of the table control section
00285      * 
00286      * @param   string  The name of the property
00287      * @return  mixed   The value of the property
00288      */
00289     public function __get( $name )
00290     {
00291         // Checks if the property exists
00292         if( isset( $this->_ctrl[ ( string )$name ] ) ) {
00293             
00294             // Returns the value of the property
00295             return $this->_ctrl[ ( string )$name ];
00296         }
00297         
00298         // No such property
00299         return false;
00300     }

00306      * @param   mixed   The value of the property
00307      * @return  NULL
00308      */
00309     public function __set( $name, $value )
00310     {
00311         $this->_ctrl[ ( string )$name ] = $value;
00312     }

00320     public function __isset( $name )
00321     {

00331     public function __unset( $name )

00336     /**
00337      * Converts the TCA table object to a serialized array
00338      * 
00339      * @return  string  The serialized array
00340      */
00341     public function __toString()
00342     {
00343         return serialize( $this->toArray() );
00344     }
00345     
00346     /**
00347      * Gets an instance of a TCA table
00348      * 
00349      * If the specified instance does not exist, this method will create it,
00350      * and then return it.
00351      * 
00352      * @param   string              The extension key
00353      * @param   string              The short name name of the table (will be prepended with the extension key, in accordance to the TYPO3 coding guidelines)
00354      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Table    The instance of the TCA table
00355      */
00356     public static function getInstance( $extKey, $name )
00357     {
00358         // Checks if the requested instance already exists
00359         if( !isset( self::$_instances[ $name ] ) ) {
00360             
00361             // Creates the full table name
00362             $tableName                     = 'tx_'
00363                                            . str_replace( '_', '', $extKey )
00364                                            . '_'
00365                                            . $name;
00366             
00367             // Creates a new instance for the requested table
00368             self::$_instances[ $tableName ] = new self( ( string )$extKey, $tableName );
00369             self::$_nbInstances++;
00370         }
00371         
00372         // Returns the requested instance
00373         return self::$_instances[ $tableName ];
00374     }
00375     
00376     /**
00377      * Adds a field for the current instance (table)
00378      * 
00379      * @param   string                      The name of the field
00380      * @param   string                      The type of the field (see TYPO3 Core API, TCA section)
00381      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field            The TCA field instance
00382      * @throws  tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception  If the field type is invalid
00383      */
00384     private function _addField( $name, $type )
00385     {
00386         // Checks the field type to get the field object class
00387         switch( $type ) {
00388             
00389             // Valid TYPO3 field types
00390             case 'input':
00391             case 'text':
00392             case 'check':
00393             case 'radio':
00394             case 'select':
00395             case 'group':
00396             case 'none':
00397             case 'passthrough':
00398             case 'user':
00399             case 'flex':
00400             case 'inline':
00401                 
00402                 // Field class
00403                 $fieldClass = 'tx_oop_Tca_Field_' . ucfirst( $type );
00404                 break;
00405             
00406             // Invalid field type
00407             default:
00408                 
00409                 // Exception, as the field type is not recognized
00410                 throw new tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception(
00411                     'The requested field type (' . $type . ') for field \'' . $name . '\' is not a valid TYPO3 TCA field.',
00412                     tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception::EXCEPTION_INVALID_FIELD_TYPE
00413                 );
00414         }
00415         
00416         // Create the field object and stores it to the fields array
00417         $this->_fields[ $name ] = new $fieldClass( $this, $name );
00418         
00419         // Returns the field object
00420         return $this->_fields[ $name ];
00421     }
00422     
00423     /**
00424      * Converts the current TCA object to an array, for use with TYPO3
00425      * 
00426      * @return  array   The TCA array for the current instance
00427      */
00428     public function toArray()
00429     {
00430         $tca = array(
00431             'ctrl'      => $this->_ctrl,
00432             'interface' => array(
00433                 'showRecordFieldList' => implode( ',', $this->_userFields )
00434             ),
00435             'columns'   => array(),
00436             'types'     => array(),
00437             'palettes'  => array()
00438         );
00439         
00440         // Process each field
00441         foreach( $this->_fields as $fieldName => $fieldObject ) {
00442             
00443             // Converts the field object to a PHP array
00444             $tca[ 'columns' ][ $fieldName ] = $fieldObject->toArray();
00445         }
00446         
00447         return $tca;
00448     }
00449     
00450     /**
00451      * Stores the current TCA object to the TYPO3 TCA array
00452      * 
00453      * @return  array   The TCA array for the current instance (by reference)
00454      */
00455     public function &storeToTca()
00456     {
00457         // Converts and stores the TCA array for the current instance
00458         $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $this->_instanceName ] = $this->toArray();
00459         
00460         // Returns a reference to the stored TCA array
00461         return $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $this->_instanceName ];
00462     }

00469     public function getTableName()
00470     {
00471         return $this->_instanceName;
00472     }

00479     public function getExtensionKey()

00481         return $this->_extKey;

00483     
00484     /**
00485      * Adds a field for the current instance (table)
00486      * 
00487      * @param   string                      The name of the field
00488      * @param   string                      The type of the field (see TYPO3 Core API, TCA section)
00489      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field            The TCA field instance
00490      * @throws  tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception  If the field name is reserved
00491      * @throws  tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception  If the field already exists
00492      */
00493     public function addField( $name, $type )
00494     {
00495         // Ensure passed values are string
00496         $name = ( string )$name;
00497         $type = ( string )$type;
00498         
00499         // Checks if the field already exists
00500         if( isset( $this->_fields[ $name ] ) ) {
00501             
00502             // The field already exist
00503             throw new tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception(
00504                 'The field \'' . $name . '\' already exists. Please use the ' . __CLASS__ . '::getField() method instead.',
00505                 tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception::EXCEPTION_FIELD_ALREADY_EXISTS
00506             );
00507         }
00508         
00509         // Checks the field name
00510         if( isset( self::$_reserved[ $name ] ) ) {
00511             
00512             // Reserved field name
00513             throw new tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception(
00514                 'The field name \'' . $name . '\' is reserved.',
00515                 tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception::EXCEPTION_RESERVED_FIELD_NAME
00516             );
00517         }
00518         
00519         // Registers the field name
00520         $this->_userFields[] = $name;
00521         
00522         // Creates and returns the field
00523         return $this->_addField( $name, $type );
00524     }
00525     
00526     /**
00527      * Sets the default 'SORT BY' clause for current instance (table)
00528      * 
00529      * @param   string  The name of the sort field
00530      * @param   boolean True if the sort is descending, otherwise false
00531      * @return  NULL
00532      */
00533     public function setDefaultSortBy( $name, $desc = false )
00534     {
00535         $this->_ctrl[ 'default_sortby' ] = ( ( boolean )$desc ) ? 'ORDER BY ' . $name . ' DESC' : 'ORDER BY ' . $name;
00536     }
00537     
00538     /**
00539      * Gets a specific field
00540      * 
00541      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field            The requested field
00542      * @throws  tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception  If the field does not exist
00543      */
00544     public function getField( $name )
00545     {
00546         // Checks if the field exists
00547         if( isset( $this->_fields[ $name ] ) ) {
00548             
00549             // Returns the field object
00550             return $this->_fields[ $name ];
00551         }
00552         
00553         // No such field
00554         throw new tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception(
00555             'The requested field does not exist (' . $name . '). You should first add it with the ' . __CLASS__ . '::addField() method.',
00556             tx_oop_Tca_Table_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_FIELD
00557         );
00558     }
00559     
00560     /**
00561      * Adds the 'hidden' field
00562      * 
00563      * @param   boolean                 Wheter the checkbox is checked by default or not
00564      * @param   string                  The name of the field (default is 'hidden')
00565      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field_Check  The 'hidden' field object
00566      */
00567     public function addHiddenField( $checked = false, $name = 'hidden' )
00568     {
00569         // Checks if a field is already registered
00570         if( isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'disabled' ] ) ) {
00571             
00572             // Removes the previous field
00573             unset( $this->_fields[ $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'disabled' ] ] );
00574         }
00575         
00576         // Creates the field
00577         $field          = $this->_addField( ( string )$name, 'check' );
00578         
00579         // Sets the default value
00580         $field->default = ( int )$checked;
00581         
00582         // Sets the field label
00583         $field->label   = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.hidden';
00584         
00585         // Checks for the 'enablecolumns' property
00586         if( !isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00587             || !is_array( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00588         ) {
00589             
00590             // Creates the array
00591             $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] = array();
00592         }
00593         
00594         // Enables the field
00595         $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'disabled' ] = ( string )$name;
00596         
00597         // Returns the field
00598         return $field;
00599     }
00600     
00601     /**
00602      * Adds the 'starttime' field
00603      * 
00604      * @param   string                  The name of the field (default is 'starttime')
00605      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field_Input  The 'starttime' field object
00606      */
00607     public function addStartTimeField( $name = 'starttime' )
00608     {
00609         // Checks if a field is already registered
00610         if( isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'starttime' ] ) ) {
00611             
00612             // Removes the previous field
00613             unset( $this->_fields[ $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'starttime' ] ] );
00614         }
00615         
00616         // Creates the field
00617         $field        = $this->_addField( ( string )$name, 'input' );
00618         
00619         // Sets the field label
00620         $field->label = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.starttime';
00621         
00622         // Add the eval rule
00623         $field->addEval( 'date' );
00624         
00625         // Configures the field options
00626         $field->size     = 8;
00627         $field->max      = 20;
00628         $field->checkbox = '0';
00629         $field->default  = '0';
00630         
00631         // Checks for the 'enablecolumns' property
00632         if( !isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00633             || !is_array( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00634         ) {
00635             
00636             // Creates the array
00637             $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] = array();
00638         }
00639         
00640         // Enables the field
00641         $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'starttime' ] = ( string )$name;
00642         
00643         // Returns the field
00644         return $field;
00645     }
00646     
00647     /**
00648      * Adds the 'endtime' field
00649      * 
00650      * @param   string                  The name of the field (default is 'endtime')
00651      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field_Input  The 'endtime' field object
00652      */
00653     public function addEndTimeField( $name = 'endtime' )
00654     {
00655         // Checks if a field is already registered
00656         if( isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'endtime' ] ) ) {
00657             
00658             // Removes the previous field
00659             unset( $this->_fields[ $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'endtime' ] ] );
00660         }
00661         
00662         // Creates the field
00663         $field           = $this->_addField( ( string )$name, 'input' );
00664         
00665         // Adds a checkbox
00666         $field->checkbox = true;
00667         
00668         // Sets the field label
00669         $field->label    = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.endtime';
00670         
00671         // Add the eval rule
00672         $field->addEval( 'date' );
00673         
00674         // Configures the field options
00675         $field->size     = 8;
00676         $field->max      = 20;
00677         $field->checkbox = '0';
00678         $field->default  = '0';
00679         
00680         // Sets the range
00681         $field->setRange(
00682             mktime( 3, 14, 7, 1, 19, 2038 ),
00683             mktime( 0, 0, 0, date( 'm' ) - 1, date( 'd' ), date( 'Y' ) )
00684         );
00685         
00686         // Checks for the 'enablecolumns' property
00687         if( !isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00688             || !is_array( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00689         ) {
00690             
00691             // Creates the array
00692             $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] = array();
00693         }
00694         
00695         // Enables the field
00696         $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'endtime' ] = ( string )$name;
00697         
00698         // Returns the field
00699         return $field;
00700     }
00701     
00702     /**
00703      * Adds the 'fe_group' field
00704      * 
00705      * @param   string                  The name of the field (default is 'fe_group')
00706      * @return  tx_oop_Tca_Field_Select The 'fe_group' field object
00707      */
00708     public function addFeUserGroupField( $name = 'fe_group' )
00709     {
00710         // Checks if a field is already registered
00711         if( isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'fe_group' ] ) ) {
00712             
00713             // Removes the previous field
00714             unset( $this->_fields[ $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'fe_group' ] ] );
00715         }
00716         
00717         // Creates the field
00718         $field = $this->_addField( ( string )$name, 'select' );
00719         
00720         // Sets the foreign table
00721         $field->foreign_table = 'fe_groups';
00722         
00723         // Sets the field label
00724         $field->label         = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.fe_groups';
00725         
00726         // Adds the select items
00727         $field->addItem(  0,        '' );
00728         $field->addItem( -1,        'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.hide_at_login' );
00729         $field->addItem( -2,        'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.any_login' );
00730         $field->addItem( '--div--', 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.usergroups' );
00731         
00732         // Checks for the 'enablecolumns' property
00733         if( !isset( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00734             || !is_array( $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] )
00735         ) {
00736             
00737             // Creates the array
00738             $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ] = array();
00739         }
00740         
00741         // Enables the field
00742         $this->_ctrl[ 'enablecolumns' ][ 'fe_group' ] = ( string )$name;
00743         
00744         // Returns the field
00745         return $field;
00746     }

00751     public function enableVersionning( $origUid = 't3_origuid' )
00752     {
00753         $this->_ctrl[ 'versioningWS' ] = true;
00754         $this->_ctrl[ 'origUid' ]      = $origUid;
00755         
00756         $label        = $this->_addField( 't3ver_label', 'input' );
00757         $label->label = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.versionLabel';
00758         $label->size  = 30;
00759         $label->max   = 30;

00762     /**
00763      * 
00764      */
00765     public function enableLocalization( $languageField = 'sys_language_uid', $origPointerField = 'l10n_parent', $diffSourceField = 'l10n_diffsource' )
00766     {
00767         $this->_ctrl[ 'languageField' ]            = $languageField;
00768         $this->_ctrl[ 'transOrigPointerField' ]    = $origPointerField;
00769         $this->_ctrl[ 'transOrigDiffSourceField' ] = $diffSourceField;
00770         
00771         $language                      = $this->_addField( $languageField, 'select' );
00772         $language->label               = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.language';
00773         $language->foreign_table       = 'sys_language';
00774         $language->foreign_table_where = 'ORDER BY sys_language.title';
00775         $language->addItem( -1, 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.allLanguages' );
00776         $language->addItem(  0, 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.default_value' );
00777         
00778         $origPointer                      = $this->_addField( $origPointerField, 'select' );
00779         $origPointer->label               = 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_general.xml:LGL.l18n_parent';
00780         $origPointer->displayCond         = 'FIELD:' . $languageField . ':>:0';
00781         $origPointer->foreign_table       = $this->_instanceName;
00782         $origPointer->foreign_table_where = 'AND '
00783                                           . $this->_instanceName
00784                                           . '.pid=###CURRENT_PID### AND '
00785                                           . $this->_instanceName
00786                                           . '.' . $languageField
00787                                           . ' IN (-1,0)';
00788         $origPointer->addItem( 0, '' );
00789         
00790         $diffSource  = $this->_addField( $diffSourceField, 'passthrough' );
00791     }
